the programme of international relations and public diplomacy is concept which allows students complete studies for two semesters at the jagiellonian university in krakow and two semesters at the university of siena in italy it focuses acquiring knowledge combining the issues of analysis of both international relations and state activities in the external sphere and adapting the possessed knowledge and skills with particular emphasis the importance of public diplomacy political economic cultural both at the level of global and regional institutions and state and organizations main obligatory subjects public diplomacy world politics since international economics global comparative politics international law and human rights persons eligible apply for the programme are holders of higher education diploma at least undergraduate in any field candidates are placed the ranking list in order established the basis of final result expressed scale from calculated as follows assessment of the motivation letter written in english preliminary thesis project will also be assessed as part of the motivation letter maximum of points points awarded for reference letters maximum of points

the primary goal of music in public space studies is offer course which ensures that its graduates acquire qualifications knowledge skills and social competences needed undertake both an artistic and entrepreneurial activities in the public space so as animate musical life and support professional musicians in their public career studying music in public space creates an opportunity for each student s personal artistic development as well as for promoting their musical talents in public means of projects and events of their own design furthermore the goal of the study is enable the graduates undertake artistic activities in the social and cultural reality and organize musical life in both big and small centers the latter typically having limited access artistic events the profile of the study aims at providing students with practical work experience during practice period the graduates will be eligible for employment in cultural centers institutions and offices the bachelor of arts degree earned in the music in public space program entitles the graduates pursue further education in postgraduate studies teaching activities are conducted in small groups which enables effective mastering the rules governing the work of music learn the history of music including jazz and popular music as well as enhance auditory skills learn harmonics the basics of composing arrangements improvisations etc students have an opportunity of individual contact with teachers of various instruments for example piano accordion pipe organ percussion guitar and violin they are also involved in choir conducting and leading instrumental combos the collaborative work of students and teachers results in various artistic activities individual performances concerts of the choir instrumental ensembles as well as awards won at competitions in poland and abroad teaching activities are conducted artists who perform regularly in many renowned concert halls in poland and abroad every year the teachers of the department of music publish monographs and scientific articles the department closely cooperates with the częstochowa philharmonic other cultural institutions of the city and the region and partner universities abroad the department frequently hosts professors from foreign institutions including ukraine slovakia lithuania germany and the usa who conduct classes with students our students regularly take part in international exchange programs the graduate of music in public space earns the bachelor of arts degree nan nan criteria for secondary school exit exam concerning the new matura exam from and subsequent years applicants are expected demonstrate good ear for music and their musicianship as well as their skills of playing musical of their own choice or singing ability according the chosen exam at the university grade from the secondary school matura exam secondary school certificate in the native language candidate auditory aptitude test animal science speciality bioengineering in animal science studia stacjonarne ii stopnia magisterskie kierunku zootechnika animal science specjalność bioengineering in animal science głównym celem studiów szkolenie specjalistów posiadających wiedzę umiejętności zakresie planowania organizacji hodowli inżynierii genetycznej diagnostyki molekularnej technik reprodukcyjnych metod hodowli komórek tkanek metod produkcji zwierzęcej the main goal of bioengineering in animal science is train specialists with knowledge and skills in planning and organization of breeding ii genetic engineering and molecular diagnostics iii reproduction biotechniques such as in vitro fertilization methods microsurgery methods of oocyte fertilization embryo culture methods extracorporeal maturation of embryos animal cloning transgenesis cryopreservation of oocytes and embryos cytogenetic and molecular methods used in genetic diagnostics iv cell and tissue culture methods and v methods of animal production the graduates are able communicate accurately with the various stakeholders in the verbal written and graphical form they can independently take decisions organize teamwork serve as managers as well as undertake establish and run their own business the graduates of this specialty can apply modern analytical methods used in research in the field of animal science they are prepared for professional career in research institutes especially related animal reproduction and animal science the supervision of breeding and insemination services farm companies agricultural advisory centres state and local government and many other institutions of broadly defined agricultural services and after completing pedagogical education can be employed in agricultural education the graduates are fully prepared for independent research and taking up the third degree studies phd wybrane przedmioty programie studiów zoologia ekologią anatomia zwierząt mikrobiologia chemia dobrostan zwierząt chemia graduates of renewable energy sources and waste management course have profound knowledge of the technical tasks of engineering and environmental management in the area of res wm they have theoretically founded thorough knowledge of res wm including engineering design of equipment installations and structures designed generate energy from renewable sources and of waste management issues they also have advanced knowledge of economics and law necessary understand conditions of engineering work adequate res wm including extensive knowledge of the function and development of rural areas they have knowledge about the operation and reliability of machines and equipment designed for res wm and the rules of creating and developing business based the knowledge of res wm issues graduates of renewable energy sources and waste management course can analyse processes typical of res wm and optimise them through analytical methods and simulation they are able evaluate the advantages and disadvantages of performed engineering operations including their originality they recognise the systemic and environmental economic legal aspects of performed engineering operations they observe osh rules at work they can perform critical analysis of the operation and evaluate existing technical solutions in equipment structures systems applied in production of energy from renewable sources and in waste management they have the ability identify and formulate specification of engineering task characteristic of res wm and can analyse phenomena that affect production of energy from renewable sources and the impact of waste management natural environment they can plan and supervise the operation of machinery technical equipment and systems ensure operation graduates of renewable energy sources and waste management course are aware of the importance of continued education and in their field they understand the aspects and effects of engineering including the impact of engineering natural environment and the associated responsibility for taken decisions they have the ability interact and work in team assuming various roles and are capable of establishing priorities that serve accomplish task or tasks imposed others they can identify and resolve dilemmas related the practised profession they possess an entrepreneurial mindset they are aware of the social professional and moral responsibility for the natural environment they are familiar with practices aimed at reducing the negative impact of performed res wm operations nan nan szczegółowe zasady rekrutacji dostępne the students of sustainability management can gain knowledge and practical skills within the courses related the environment including climate change and its consequences natural hazards water management problems waste management responsible management of environmental resources protection of natural ecosystems and biodiversity issues focused specific models of economic development and social life the impact of environmental changes social interactions management management and leadership as mechanisms of planning and implementation of tasks the graduates will be ready forecast and identify the most pressing problems of the contemporary world analyse them and evaluate ecological and human risks they will also be able design solutions various crisis situations in the human among others climate change natural disasters water resource deficits ecosystem transformation biodiversity reduction energy security etc course structure introduction sustainable development population and sustainablility nature conservation and restoration earth system dynamics ecosystem services sustainable development policies sustainable agriculture gis for environmental analysis global climate change water global crisis natural hazards the programme is addressed candidates holding high school diploma admission of candidates is based highest final grade in of the following subjects biology chemistry physics geography mathematics taken in the secondary school leaving examination

the main goal of the business informatics bachelor studies program is deliver both theoretical and practical knowledge about applying computer science methods and tools in management and business studies provide graduates with practical skills in the use of software tools supporting business processes students will learn among others methods and techniques of analysis and design of information systems business applications database technology design and development of mobile applications methods of project management the graduate will have the skills analyze and synthesize business problems adapt changing conditions take up challenges related the implementation and use of modern information and communication technologies ict work in project team as well as the ability learn and update knowledge these skills will be acquired along with knowledge in the field of it management accounting finance quantitative methods and economics specialization the chosen courses are run both polish and foreign practitioners lecturers in cooperation with business partners who use active teaching methods such as group work discussions business simulations brainstorming learning the programme ist designed for students who want discover the world of bustiness informatics snd the field of management accounting finance quantitative methods and economics przedmioty kwalifikacyjne brane uwagę procesie rekrutacji kierunkach prowadzonych uczelnię matematyka język obcy nowożytny spośród angielski francuski hiszpański rosyjski niemiecki włoski przedmiot wyboru spośród następujących język polski geografia historia wiedza społeczeństwie fizyka chemia biologia informatyka filozofia

communication management studies offer comprehensive approach external and internal communication of brands organizations and their image means of existing communication systems graduates of the program will have acquired theoretical knowledge and practical competences in the areas of specific aspects of communication of organizations and their external and internal image advertising public relations branding the graduates of this program will have an extensive knowledge social communication fundamentals of economy and consumer behaviors as well as vast project competences comprising the general area of image building and management in reference groups there will be special emphasis building communication competences teamwork and negotiating skills as well as techniques of effective and efficient communication practical skills connected with graphic designing in traditional and new media will also be very important element of the teaching program the core subjects public relations branding advertising design theories of communication lifestyle and consumer insights design management graphic fundamentals teamwork and team management media planning the course is dedicated graduates of other studies the admission requirements for this field of study include possession of diploma entitled undertake studies presentation of certificate of proficiency in english of at least level the council of europe scale admission will be based the place the ranking list created according the final grade the diploma of the or studies

master s degree in the field of economic diplomacy and statecraft deals with the issues of the activity of national institutions in promoting the economic interests of the state the curriculum combines the issue of economic diplomacy with the economic strategy of the state program points out that economic diplomacy is not only the issue of classical diplomacy with the tasks of promoting the country economic interests but building systemic and strategic solutions therefore the study program indicates the need treat economic diplomacy as state system related the country economic and political potential with its effective external promotion of its interests and cooperation with actors in this area in such an approach it is more reasonable use the english term economic statecraft as multidimensional and multilevel system of promotion and implementation of economic interests abroad thus economic diplomacy is understood as an activity face the challenges in operating in culturally politically and legally different markets such as the countries of the eu eastern neighborhood the program also draws attention the role of poland and central european countries as brokers of knowledge about cultural and political conditions of economic relations with countries east of the european union nan graduates of this degree will be equipped with the ability think analytically critically and independently which will enable them perform complex analysis of the rapidly changing international political and economic reality brak szczegółowego

the master degree program in esg in finance deals with the theoretical and practical aspects of the functioning of companies and other financial institutions in the environment of changes related the environment of environmental challenges in the financial sector environmental aspects and reporting in the sector of finance are an increasingly important part of risk management in finance the studies provide an knowledge of the principles and mechanisms shaping the international esg environment in finance and help understand the increasingly complex reality around us they discuss at an advanced level the main theories and issues related the application of esg in multinational corporations and financial investments in global markets the strength of the study is that it prepares you work as an expert in esg processes including valuation or management of socially responsible development nan brak szczegółowego

the field of study is commercial in nature and is dedicated students who have completed undergraduate studies both polish interested in the european financial market and foreign the educational program contains both theoretical content and practical knowledge and its aim is prepare graduates use the acquired competencies in the widely understood labor market especially in international companies providing financial services business and private entities as well as companies operating in global environment especially in the european financial market the aim is create modern profile of the future graduate adequate the anticipated needs of the labor market therefore teaching cooperation with various institutes is planned which will make it possible offer the broadest possible interdisciplinary teaching in this field of study the program familiarizes students with the latest trends and processes in financial markets in the era of digitization of the economy it prepares students for taking an international exam and obtain the european foundation certificate in banking ecb efcb offered the european banking financial services training association the professional training firm in cooperation with polish bank association thanks cooperation with many financial institutions polish bank association santander bank polska sa and euroclear bank poland students have the opportunity acquire practical knowledge and skills thanks classes conducted in english the student is familiar with terminology used in the financial market nan brak szczegółowego

the field of study financial accounting accredited acca is new unique field of study offered the cracow university of economics the major is conducted in english in the system of supplementary master studies and most didactic classes in the field of study can be carried out as part of distance learning the offer is addressed students from various countries around the world especially those where acca accreditation is valued companies and the economic environment including europe asia africa where international financial and accounting centers are located india china indonesia graduates of the major can obtain exemptions from acca exams at the applied knowledge and applied skills levels didactic classes can be carried out mostly in the form of distance learning stationary classes can be held in the formula of winter school and summer school graduates have the opportunity study in modular classes as part of postgraduate studies which prepares them very well for passing strategic acca exams which are the last stage of obtaining acca accreditation nan nan brak szczegółowego

the purpose of the course is provide knowledge of financial markets with particular emphasis empirical methods used in analysis in financial markets and practical skills for obtaining financial data processing the detailed scope of the cfa degree program is consistent with the scope of cfa level and level accreditation requirements financial analytics is semester course aimed at people from different parts of the world who want improve their competencies related big data processing analysis and evaluation such competencies in the era of big data artificial intelligence and the offshoring of corporate financial functions are particularly relevant today graduates can take up employment not only in accounting offices financial centers auditing companies but also in various types of institutions of controlling nature the knowledge gained will also allow you run your own business or provide consulting and advisory services the combination of knowledge of financial and managerial accounting will also predestine our graduates take up the positions of managing director financial director specialist in managerial accounting or controlling students completion of the financial analyst course will have the necessary knowledge become chartered financial analyst level ii and iii nan brak szczegółowego

the global human resource management major is designed for those interested in human resource management in an international environment organizations striving gain competitive advantage need professionals prepared work in rapidly changing world evolving technology is altering the way work and that is why skills such as flexibility and adaptability are crucial the ghrm major helps students develop competences related the use of new tools and technologies in managing employees as well as gain the knowledge necessary work in globalizing world the study program includes variety of subjects both issues fundamental hrm professionals training development and careers or performance and reward management related current challenges big data text mining and social media analysis and completely unique politics and economy of outer space money in the digital era nan brak szczegółowego

the contemporary processes of internationalization of economic activity make the knowledge of international finance and global financial markets essential for managing multinational corporation the studies provide knowledge of the rules and mechanisms shaping the international environment of enterprises and help understand the increasingly complex reality that surrounds us they discuss at an advanced level the main theories and issues related the multinational corporations and financial investments global markets graduates of this degree will be equipped with the ability think analytically critically and independently which will enable them perform complex analysis of the rapidly changing international financial and economic reality nan brak szczegółowego

the master s studies in the field of international logistics contain theoretical and practical elements prepare graduates use the acquired competences the labor market studies are interdisciplinary in nature students gain knowledge in the area of logistics management and quality sciences and it the aim of this program is familiarize students with the complexity and multifaceted nature of international logistics management systems and the impact of globalization processes logistics systems the possibilities and conditions for shaping logistics in an interdisciplinary approach will be explained the adopted concept of international logistics education assumes the acquisition of theoretical and methodological knowledge as well as skills in managing business activity enabling students independently formulate practical and theoretical conclusions nan brak szczegółowego

economics speciality international master double degree program in business economics absolwenci specjalności business economics kierunku ekonomia economics posiadają wszechstronną wiedzę dziedzinie ekonomii zarządzania trakcie studiów nabywają umiejętności zakresie identyfikacji analizy otoczenia rynkowego podmiotów gospodarczych prowadzących działalność zarówno skali lokalnej międzynarodowej ponadto posiadają obszerną wiedzę dotyczącą zagadnień związanych gospodarką żywnościową agrobiznesem głównie obszarze realizowania założeń międzynarodowej polityki rolnej wielofunkcyjnego rozwoju rolnictwa obszarów wiejskich absolwenci potrafią sporządzać strategie plany rozwoju przygotowywać projekty wnioski aplikacyjne zakresu marketingu zarządzania zasobami przedsiębiorstwa przygotowani pracy stanowiskach menadżerów średniego wyższego szczebla specjalistów ds zarządzania doradców konsultantów organizacjach charakterze gospodarczym publicznym prowadzenia własnej działalności gospodarczej szczególnie obszarze rolnictwa gałęzi towarzyszących rolnictwu językiem wykładowym studiów angielski absolwenci stanie posługiwać płynnie zakresie komunikacji biznesowej przygotowywania prowadzenia prezentacji projektowych pracy analitycznej raportowaniu prowadzeniu badań naukowych zakresie problematyki the university of agriculture in cracow and slovak agriculture university in nitra are the partner institutions cooperating in joint international educational programme the international master double degree program in business economics the program lasts four semesters ects the first and third semester are attended in nitra the second semester in cracow the fourth semester is assigned course at the university of agriculture in cracow and the preparation of the master thesis at the home university kierunek osób doskonale posługujących językiem angielskim kandydatów dynamicznych kontaktowych przyszłych menedżerów informacje procesie rekrutacji należy sprawdzać witrynie internetowej uczelni

graduate of the international master program in management accounting will learn how conduct financial and analyses how apply internal audit resources and recommend appropriate solutions or internal controls become skilled in people performance management and project management students gain knowledge of economic legal ethical and other conditions of various types of professional activity related international business including the principle of industrial property and copyright protection major courses business ethics business law enterprise risk management framework in action financial analysis and working capital management financial strategy fixed term and equity financing group accounting under ifrs integrated reporting international financial reporting standards managing performance risk control and uncertainty management strategic management strategic management from available options optimal choices value enhancement technics this program is an offer graduates of the first the applicants should submit an academic degree diploma and diploma supplement

the programme of international relations and public diplomacy is concept which allows students complete studies for two semesters at the jagiellonian university in krakow and two semesters at the university of siena in italy it focuses acquiring knowledge combining the issues of analysis of both international relations and state activities in the external sphere and adapting the possessed knowledge and skills with particular emphasis the importance of public diplomacy political economic cultural both at the level of global and regional institutions and state and organizations main obligatory subjects public diplomacy world politics since international economics global comparative politics international law and human rights persons eligible apply for the programme are holders of higher education diploma at least undergraduate in any field candidates are placed the ranking list in order established the basis of final result expressed scale from calculated as follows assessment of the motivation letter written in english preliminary thesis project will also be assessed as part of the motivation letter maximum of points points awarded for reference letters maximum of points

communication management studies offer comprehensive approach external and internal communication of brands organizations and their image means of existing communication systems graduates of the program will have acquired theoretical knowledge and practical competences in the areas of specific aspects of communication of organizations and their external and internal image advertising public relations branding the graduates of this program will have an extensive knowledge social communication fundamentals of economy and consumer behaviors as well as vast project competences comprising the general area of image building and management in reference groups there will be special emphasis building communication competences teamwork and negotiating skills as well as techniques of effective and efficient communication practical skills connected with graphic designing in traditional and new media will also be very important element of the teaching program the core subjects public relations branding advertising design theories of communication lifestyle and consumer insights design management graphic fundamentals teamwork and team management media planning the course is dedicated graduates of other studies the admission requirements for this field of study include possession of diploma entitled undertake studies presentation of certificate of proficiency in english of at least level the council of europe scale admission will be based the place the ranking list created according the final grade the diploma of the or studies

the primary goal of music in public space studies is offer course which ensures that its graduates acquire qualifications knowledge skills and social competences needed undertake both an artistic and entrepreneurial activities in the public space so as animate musical life and support professional musicians in their public career studying music in public space creates an opportunity for each student s personal artistic development as well as for promoting their musical talents in public means of projects and events of their own design furthermore the goal of the study is enable the graduates undertake artistic activities in the social and cultural reality and organize musical life in both big and small centers the latter typically having limited access artistic events the profile of the study aims at providing students with practical work experience during practice period the graduates will be eligible for employment in cultural centers institutions and offices the bachelor of arts degree earned in the music in public space program entitles the graduates pursue further education in postgraduate studies teaching activities are conducted in small groups which enables effective mastering the rules governing the work of music learn the history of music including jazz and popular music as well as enhance auditory skills learn harmonics the basics of composing arrangements improvisations etc students have an opportunity of individual contact with teachers of various instruments for example piano accordion pipe organ percussion guitar and violin they are also involved in choir conducting and leading instrumental combos the collaborative work of students and teachers results in various artistic activities individual performances concerts of the choir instrumental ensembles as well as awards won at competitions in poland and abroad teaching activities are conducted artists who perform regularly in many renowned concert halls in poland and abroad every year the teachers of the department of music publish monographs and scientific articles the department closely cooperates with the częstochowa philharmonic other cultural institutions of the city and the region and partner universities abroad the department frequently hosts professors from foreign institutions including ukraine slovakia lithuania germany and the usa who conduct classes with students our students regularly take part in international exchange programs the graduate of music in public space earns the bachelor of arts degree nan nan criteria for secondary school exit exam concerning the new matura exam from and subsequent years applicants are expected demonstrate good ear for music and their musicianship as well as their skills of playing musical of their own choice or singing ability according the chosen exam at the university grade from the secondary school matura exam secondary school certificate in the native language candidate auditory aptitude test see more details school webside nan candidates are expected have very good oral and written command of the english language and basic undergraduate research competence in the humanities or social sciences as well as basic knowledge of polish central and eastern european and jewish history the admission requirements for this field of study include possession of diploma entitled undertake studies persons with bachelor s or master s degree in jewish studies graduates of other bachelor s or master s degree programmes and graduates of jewish religious colleges are eligible presentation of certificate of proficiency in english of at least level the council of europe scale

international relations and area studies programme is an undergraduate interdisciplinary programme that offers rigorous international and comparative perspective the contemporary global system and different regions of the world its aim is foster creative thinking about complex global problems and equip students with the analytical tools language expertise and understanding guide them in that process our degree provides solid grounding in international issues together with an opportunity specialise in international security or area studies research and teaching spans the full spectrum of topics in international relations and area studies including international politics and economics development global governance ethics of international affairs conflict resolution and peace building regional integration cultural diversity and intercultural dialogue specializations wybrane przedmioty programie studiów political philosophy and ir introduction politics and political science international political economy international relations in the century academic english research and presentation globalization and global governance political and economic geography theories of international relations human rights ethics and international affairs culture in international relations kierunek osób doskonale posługujących językiem angielskim kandydatów wyróżniać wysoka komunikatywność otwartość kultury ludzi zainteresowanie sprawami europy rekrutacja odbywa parciu wyniki maturalne jednego przedmiotu wybranego spośród język polski język angielski język niemiecki język hiszpański język francuski język włoski język dodatkowym kryterium rozmowa kwalifikacyjna sprawdzająca znajomość języka angielskiego osoby posiadający dokument zaświadczający znajomość języka poziomie zwolnione rozmowy

the degree journalism and new media is for everybody who wants discover the tools of communication in the world of new technologies and digital media during the course you will master journalistic techniques edit texts and create multimedia materials all under the supervision of experienced journalists including jacek żakowski roman kurkiewicz michał komar edwin bendyk juliusz braun konrad piasecki wojciech maziarski wojciech orliński and grzegorz miecugow during your studies you will have the opportunity put your knowledge into practice amongst others editing nationwide newspapers and weeklies working in television and radio and working in lifestyle magazine film and sports editorial teams as result of practical workshops you will acquire skills that will be appreciated your future will acquire the following knowledge and practical skills career prospects nan nan brak szczegółowego

eu energy and climate law is designed equip graduate students with comprehensive set of skills and knowledge necessary properly address the challenges of energy transition this requires not only an analysis of eu energy and climate law but also view the economic technological political as well as societal and philosophical background and implications of this process the holistic approach of the program will provide students with broad understanding of major issues shaping regulatory solutions of the eu energy and climate policy and ways of their implementation at the member states level program structure includes following courses eu energy law eu climate law energy transformation international dimension of energy and climate politics functioning of the energy market functioning of the natural gas market energy security energy market liberalization and the application of eu competition in the energy sector legal framework of the functioning of renewable energy sources legal framework of investments process in the energy sector state aid in the energy sector nuclear law the programme is dedicated graduate students with at least bachelor degree including international students and professionals and specialists who wish gain holistic knowledge of the eu regulations in energy and climate policy as well as the functioning of the energy sector energy transition and key implications of climate change postępowanie rekrutacyjne składa dwóch etapów testu wiedzy zakresu prawa przygotowaniu prezentacji tematów listy zostanie opublikowana

animal science speciality bioengineering in animal science studia stacjonarne ii stopnia magisterskie kierunku zootechnika animal science specjalność bioengineering in animal science głównym celem studiów szkolenie specjalistów posiadających wiedzę umiejętności zakresie planowania organizacji hodowli inżynierii genetycznej diagnostyki molekularnej technik reprodukcyjnych metod hodowli komórek tkanek metod produkcji zwierzęcej the main goal of bioengineering in animal science is train specialists with knowledge and skills in planning and organization of breeding ii genetic engineering and molecular diagnostics iii reproduction biotechniques such as in vitro fertilization methods microsurgery methods of oocyte fertilization embryo culture methods extracorporeal maturation of embryos animal cloning transgenesis cryopreservation of oocytes and embryos cytogenetic and molecular methods used in genetic diagnostics iv cell and tissue culture methods and v methods of animal production the graduates are able communicate accurately with the various stakeholders in the verbal written and graphical form they can independently take decisions organize teamwork serve as managers as well as undertake establish and run their own business the graduates of this specialty can apply modern analytical methods used in research in the field of animal science they are prepared for professional career in research institutes especially related animal reproduction and animal science the supervision of breeding and insemination services farm companies agricultural advisory centres state and local government and many other institutions of broadly defined agricultural services and after completing pedagogical education can be employed in agricultural education the graduates are fully prepared for independent research and taking up the third degree studies phd wybrane przedmioty programie studiów zoologia ekologią anatomia zwierząt mikrobiologia chemia dobrostan zwierząt chemia rolna gleboznawstwem fizjologia zwierząt żywienie zwierząt biologia rozrodu paszoznawstwo chów hodowla futerkowych profilaktyka zootechniczna higiena zwierząt propozycja kandydatów doskonale posługujących językiem angielskim zasady rekrutacji należy sprawdzać stronie internetowej uczelni realizującej studia

graduates of renewable energy sources and waste management course have profound knowledge of the technical tasks of engineering and environmental management in the area of res wm they have theoretically founded thorough knowledge of res wm including engineering design of equipment installations and structures designed generate energy from renewable sources and of waste management issues they also have advanced knowledge of economics and law necessary understand conditions of engineering work adequate res wm including extensive knowledge of the function and development of rural areas they have knowledge about the operation and reliability of machines and equipment designed for res wm and the rules of creating and developing business based the knowledge of res wm issues graduates of renewable energy sources and waste management course can analyse processes typical of res wm and optimise them through analytical methods and simulation they are able evaluate the advantages and disadvantages of performed engineering operations including their originality they recognise the systemic and environmental economic legal aspects of performed engineering operations they observe osh rules at work they can perform critical analysis of the operation and evaluate existing technical solutions in equipment structures systems applied in production of energy from renewable sources and in waste management they have the ability identify and formulate specification of engineering task characteristic of res wm and can analyse phenomena that affect production of energy from renewable sources and the impact of waste management natural environment they can plan and supervise the operation of machinery technical equipment and systems ensure operation graduates of renewable energy sources and waste management course are aware of the importance of continued education and in their field they understand the aspects and effects of engineering including the impact of engineering natural environment and the associated responsibility for taken decisions they have the ability interact and work in team assuming various roles and are capable of establishing priorities that serve accomplish task or tasks imposed others they can identify and resolve dilemmas related the practised profession they possess an entrepreneurial mindset they are aware of the social professional and moral responsibility for the natural environment they are familiar with practices aimed at reducing the negative impact of performed res wm operations nan nan szczegółowe zasady rekrutacji dostępne students of astrophysics will gain knowledge in mathematical modeling computer simulations and advanced data analysis they will also develop universal research competencies including analytical and critical thinking rigorous reasoning creativity and complex problem solving active learning as well as communication and teamwork skills apart from regular courses you will acquire specialistic knowledge and advanced practical skills working within of the research teams the candidate is expected have knowledge and skills in academic mathematics and physics supported elementary competence in information technology the admission requirements for this field of study include possession of diploma entitled undertake studies candidates with bachelor s engineer s or master s degree in science science or engineering engineering are accepted presentation of certificate of proficiency in english of at least level the council of europe scale

physics of advanced materials for energy processing pamep is speciality of physics studies the program will be conducted solely in the english language with emphasis preparing its students for their future work as scientists or in areas the subject matter of the program is closely tied physics of new materials which currently have been applied or have its potential application in energy generation conversion storage and saving the goal of this program is equip student with technical expertise necessary for an academic career postgraduate degree studies or career in private sector corporations which strictly rely detailed knowledge of scientific research for instance companies involved in research producing or servicing advanced measuring tools and companies interacting with both science and the industry pamep studies will be conducted at the faculty of physics in close cooperation with the nanobiomedical centre and the faculty of chemistry at adam mickiewicz university in poznań poland pamep innovative way get sc degree in fields the graduate program offers classes strictly connected physics for instance solid state physics thermodynamics magnetism but also combined physics and chemistry for instance photovoltaics solar energy soft matter crystallography physics and biology for instance artificial photosynthesis bionanostructures and physics and nanomaterial engineering for instance conducting nanostructures and materials our students get familiarized not only with theories but also with experimental methods of materials research additionally they participate in specialized courses exploring the advanced modern material characterization techniques for instance electron and atomic force microscopy optical spectroscopy spectroscopy raman spectroscopy nmr spectroscopy laser spectroscopy neutron scattering material fabrication for instance lithography thin film deposition chemical methods and theoretical computation or computer simulation methods applied in materials physic wybrane przedmioty programie studiów signal and energy processing in nanopatterned materials physical properties of and materials and their application in low energy consuming electronic devices biophotovoltaic materials thermodynamics of electrolyte solutions and in nanomaterials doped with lanthanide ions magnetism magnetic materials and magnetization dynamics introduction computational studies of electronic structure of nanosystems electric and thermoelectric transport at the nanoscale propozycja kandydatów ścisłych umysłach zainteresowanych nowoczesnymi technologiami kandydaci muszą absolwentami studiów pierwszego odbywają rozmowę kwalifikacyjną

the studies technical physics are closely related the development of modern technologies and the education of highly qualified personnel for the medical it analytical and materials sectors the student will learn about the physical basics of medical diagnostic and therapeutic devices learn about devices used in diagnostics ultrasound tomography resonance and medical therapy and nuclear devices and the principles of their safe use there are three specialities choose courses students learn fundamentals of physics physics revisions technical mechanics mathematical methods of physics fundamentals of quantum physics atomic physics nuclear physics thermodynamics the course is dedicated for students seeking for practical knowledge of applied physics for medical practice admission of candidates is based an average of grades obtained during secondary school eq mathematics physics

communication management studies offer comprehensive approach external and internal communication of brands organizations and their image means of existing communication systems graduates of the program will have acquired theoretical knowledge and practical competences in the areas of specific aspects of communication of organizations and their external and internal image advertising public relations branding the graduates of this program will have an extensive knowledge social communication fundamentals of economy and consumer behaviors as well as vast project competences comprising the general area of image building and management in reference groups there will be special emphasis building communication competences teamwork and negotiating skills as well as techniques of effective and efficient communication practical skills connected with graphic designing in traditional and new media will also be very important element of the teaching program the core subjects public relations branding advertising design theories of communication lifestyle and consumer insights design management graphic fundamentals teamwork and team management media planning the course is dedicated graduates of other studies the admission requirements for this field of study include possession of diploma entitled undertake studies presentation of certificate of proficiency in english of at least level the council of europe scale admission will be based the place the ranking list created according the final grade the diploma of the or studies

see more details school webside nan candidates are expected have very good oral and written command of the english language and basic undergraduate research competence in the humanities or social sciences as well as basic knowledge of polish central and eastern european and jewish history the admission requirements for this field of study include possession of diploma entitled undertake studies persons with bachelor s or master s degree in jewish studies graduates of other bachelor s or master s degree programmes and graduates of jewish religious colleges are eligible presentation of certificate of proficiency in english of at least level the council of europe scale

the global human resource management major is designed for those interested in human resource management in an international environment organizations striving gain competitive advantage need professionals prepared work in rapidly changing world evolving technology is altering the way work and that is why skills such as flexibility and adaptability are crucial the ghrm major helps students develop competences related the use of new tools and technologies in managing employees as well as gain the knowledge necessary work in globalizing world the study program includes variety of subjects both issues fundamental hrm professionals training development and careers or performance and reward management related current challenges big data text mining and social media analysis and completely unique politics and economy of outer space money in the digital era nan brak szczegółowego

students of graduate programme in political science apart from regular courses actively take part in academic life participating in different political science associations conferences debates and lectures given distinguished guests from all over the world who are often invited our university as well as in social events courses in study programme political analysis comparative analysis of political regimes theories of democracy civil society general elective course occupational safety and care introduction international protection of intellectual property seminar qualitative methods and mixed methods political communication and political marketing the graduate programme in political science is addressed candidates who hold bachelor s degrees undergraduate studies from poland or abroad this is graduate master s programme the language of instruction is english admission the first year of studies is open persons holding ba master s or bsc or equivalent diploma in any degree the qualification is based an oral examination conducted in the english language suggested topics

nan nan nan brak szczegółowego

the master s studies in the field of international logistics contain theoretical and practical elements prepare graduates use the acquired competences the labor market studies are interdisciplinary in nature students gain knowledge in the area of logistics management and quality sciences and it the aim of this program is familiarize students with the complexity and multifaceted nature of international logistics management systems and the impact of globalization processes logistics systems the possibilities and conditions for shaping logistics in an interdisciplinary approach will be explained the adopted concept of international logistics education assumes the acquisition of theoretical and methodological knowledge as well as skills in managing business activity enabling students independently formulate practical and theoretical conclusions nan brak szczegółowego

international relations and area studies programme is an undergraduate interdisciplinary programme that offers rigorous international and comparative perspective the contemporary global system and different regions of the world its aim is foster creative thinking about complex global problems and equip students with the analytical tools language expertise and understanding guide them in that process our degree provides solid grounding in international issues together with an opportunity specialise in international security or area studies research and teaching spans the full spectrum of topics in international relations and area studies including international politics and economics development global governance ethics of international affairs conflict resolution and peace building regional integration cultural diversity and intercultural dialogue specializations wybrane przedmioty programie studiów political philosophy and ir introduction politics and political science international political economy international relations in the century academic english research and presentation globalization and global governance political and economic geography theories of international relations human rights ethics and international affairs culture in international relations kierunek osób doskonale posługujących językiem angielskim kandydatów wyróżniać wysoka komunikatywność otwartość kultury ludzi zainteresowanie sprawami europy rekrutacja odbywa parciu wyniki maturalne jednego przedmiotu wybranego spośród język polski język angielski język niemiecki język hiszpański język francuski język włoski język dodatkowym kryterium rozmowa kwalifikacyjna sprawdzająca znajomość języka angielskiego osoby posiadający dokument zaświadczający znajomość języka poziomie zwolnione rozmowy

it cyber security combines knowledge of computer science with knowledge of political science and administration students learn about the place of cybersecurity in the contemporary understanding of security the complexity of security threats in cyberspace basic programming structures and rules of designing programming scripts standards for information security management principles of operation of cryptographic modules and the manner of their application in it systems and others it is second cycle programme program of studies linux operating system programming in python computer networks introduction cybersecurity threats in cyberspace it english terminology security of web applications secure programming computer networks security information war in cyberspace public international law and cybersecurity the programme is addressed candidates holding bachelor degree or any other equivalent degree which grants direct access master s degree program in order be eligible for program taught in english candidates must demonstrate that they meet english requirements for given prospective students must register online in the umcs recruitment system and file all the necessary documents within the deadline or until all the spots available have been filled

the degree journalism and new media is for everybody who wants discover the tools of communication in the world of new technologies and digital media during the course you will master journalistic techniques edit texts and create multimedia materials all under the supervision of experienced journalists including jacek żakowski roman kurkiewicz michał komar edwin bendyk juliusz braun konrad piasecki wojciech maziarski wojciech orliński and grzegorz miecugow during your studies you will have the opportunity put your knowledge into practice amongst others editing nationwide newspapers and weeklies working in television and radio and working in lifestyle magazine film and sports editorial teams as result of practical workshops you will acquire skills that will be appreciated your future will acquire the following knowledge and practical skills career prospects nan nan brak szczegółowego

the interdisciplinary nature of social and public policy program not only introduces students the workings of social and public policy but also makes them responsive the concerns of other fields such as law economics history and culture this program is taught entirely in english the program comprises six semesters the first two semesters introduce students the major concepts and theories of social and public policies in contrast the remaining semesters explore designing implementing and evaluating policies related social and public issues students learn political institutions in the eu countries economics sociology of social problems quantitative research methods redistribution policy and politics social care and social work welfare mix public services design policy analysis project management international and regional organizations fundraising the program is designed for students with strong interest in making difference in today world it seeks internationally oriented candidates who are creative motivated and ready embrace multicultural environment procesie rekrutacji punktowane język polski język obcy matematyka przedmiot wyboru spośród język obcy nowożytny historia wiedza społeczeństwie geografia filozofia język łaciński kultura antyczna język grecki kultura antyczna biologia chemia fizyka fizyka informatyka historia muzyki historia sztuki

study sociology and learn analyze ongoing social transformations and predict the consequences of these transformations for regions and local communities during class activities you will discover how research changes in the labour market work in the field of social communication problems and diagnose phenomena of social pathology depending your chosen specialization you will be able expand your knowledge in the fields of social communication marketing advertising and new media social psychology or criminology the classes are taught eminent specialists and researchers in the social sciences such as sociologists of culture ethnic minorities art contemporary culture and philosophical knowledge experts include jadwiga koralewicz stanisław mocek jan pakulski jan skórzyński tadeusz gadacz dr katarzyna iwińska dr sergiusz trzeciak and dr marek will acquire factual knowledge in the following areas you will acquire practical skills in the following areas career prospects nan nan brak szczegółowego

the main goal of the business informatics bachelor studies program is deliver both theoretical and practical knowledge about applying computer science methods and tools in management and business studies provide graduates with practical skills in the use of software tools supporting business processes students will learn among others methods and techniques of analysis and design of information systems business applications database technology design and development of mobile applications methods of project management the graduate will have the skills analyze and synthesize business problems adapt changing conditions take up challenges related the implementation and use of modern information and communication technologies ict work in project team as well as the ability learn and update knowledge these skills will be acquired along with knowledge in the field of it management accounting finance quantitative methods and economics specialization the chosen courses are run both polish and foreign practitioners lecturers in cooperation with business partners who use active teaching methods such as group work discussions business simulations brainstorming learning the programme ist designed for students who want discover the world of bustiness informatics snd the field of management accounting finance quantitative methods and economics przedmioty kwalifikacyjne brane uwagę procesie rekrutacji kierunkach prowadzonych uczelnię matematyka język obcy nowożytny spośród angielski francuski hiszpański rosyjski niemiecki włoski przedmiot wyboru spośród następujących język polski geografia historia wiedza społeczeństwie fizyka chemia biologia informatyka filozofia

the course chemical engineering and technology includes general education in the field of basic chemistry general engineering activities and in the field of chemical technology and engineering concerning among others typical chemical and mechanical processes used in the chemical industry various physicochemical and analytical methods used assess the properties of engineering materials as well as the use of computer tools supporting design modelling and manufacturing graduates of studies in the field of chemical engineering and technology have systematic theoretically based general knowledge of the basic branches of chemistry as well as knowledge and engineering skills in the field of material engineering process engineering and chemical technology they know modern technologies for the production of various chemical products including ceramic composite and polymer engineering materials the degree holders can use modern methods techniques and tools for structure identification qualitative and quantitative analysis and assessment of the properties of raw materials and products the study programme additionally gives the opportunity individualise the path of education in accordance with the student interests selecting thematic blocks specialities sustainable chemical technologies green chemical technologies eliminate waste improve production safety and its economics or engineering of polymeric materials polymers are ideal for all types of engineering applications replace traditional materials with much simpler materials for manufacturing while maintaining their desired properties it is good choice for those who want hold such positions as chemical engineer process engineer product engineer process industry designer equipment designer research and development engineer production specialist laboratory research specialist quality control specialist laboratory analyst chemical installation operator technological process operator technical and commercial advisor subjects considered for admission mathematics chemistry or physics and or biology or computer science

the energy and environmental engineering studies are conducted jointly two universities of agh university of science and technology and shibaura institute of technology the main feature of the joint studies is the orientation and specialization towards the design and optimization of modern energy systems the designing and manufacturing techniques of contemporary energy materials considering environmental protection hat distinguishes the course is the focus the global aspects of energy conversion including the preparation of graduates work in international teams face global challenges of energy and environment it is programme subjects students learn general and sustainable chemistry mathematical modelling technical thermodynamics advanced heat and mass transfer modern solid state physics it is an offer those candidates who are aware of the role of energy engineering and its impact the environment as well as the development of the country application rules entrance exam average from studies

the master s studies in the field of international logistics contain theoretical and practical elements prepare graduates use the acquired competences the labor market studies are interdisciplinary in nature students gain knowledge in the area of logistics management and quality sciences and it the aim of this program is familiarize students with the complexity and multifaceted nature of international logistics management systems and the impact of globalization processes logistics systems the possibilities and conditions for shaping logistics in an interdisciplinary approach will be explained the adopted concept of international logistics education assumes the acquisition of theoretical and methodological knowledge as well as skills in managing business activity enabling students independently formulate practical and theoretical conclusions nan brak szczegółowego

it cyber security combines knowledge of computer science with knowledge of political science and administration students learn about the place of cybersecurity in the contemporary understanding of security the complexity of security threats in cyberspace basic programming structures and rules of designing programming scripts standards for information security management principles of operation of cryptographic modules and the manner of their application in it systems and others it is second cycle programme program of studies linux operating system programming in python computer networks introduction cybersecurity threats in cyberspace it english terminology security of web applications secure programming computer networks security information war in cyberspace public international law and cybersecurity the programme is addressed candidates holding bachelor degree or any other equivalent degree which grants direct access master s degree program in order be eligible for program taught in english candidates must demonstrate that they meet english requirements for given prospective students must register online in the umcs recruitment system and file all the necessary documents within the deadline or until all the spots available have been filled

the purpose of education in the field of metalcasting engineering cast for the advanced manufacturing industry conducted at the faculty of foundry engineering is prepare engineers with the ability use knowledge from basic disciplines metallurgy alloys with special properties metal and alloy processing science of casting materials and materials mold technology and casting defects thermal technology computer networks and computer simulation systems in technology students acknowledge manufacturing technologies numerical simulations modern and ecological moulding and core sands casting defects and testing technology of metals cast steel iron cast melting and casting theory of metallurgical and foundry processes properties of materials and test methods printing and reverse engineering subjects students learn properties of materials and test methods molds technology heat treatment of casting plastics and their processing reverse engineering casting defects and testing computer casting design optimalization the programme is offered graduates from bachelor studies application rules entrance exam average from studies

metallurgical engineering program is prepared offer specialized education in the field of modern extractive metallurgy it covers broad content in the field of metal production from the preparation of raw materials through the production of metal alloys obtaining an ingot it focuses the construction and principles of operation of the devices used in production as well as the techniques of the ongoing processes it enables gain the theoretical knowledge in the field of physical phenomena taking place during extraction processes and chemical reactions including their thermodynamics and kinetics subjects students learn physical chemistry extractive metallurgy of ferrous alloys metal casting metal forming thermodynamics of metals foundry technologies hydrogen and green metallurgy electrometallurgy the programme is offered graduates from bachelor studies application rules entrance exam average from studies

raw materials value chain is new master science degree major the curriculum is designed equip students with expertise in sustainable extraction processing and of raw materials the comprehensive approach of combining academic and expert knowledge will translate into awareness of and concern for the raw materials value chain sector in europe the process of knowledge acquisition will be carried out with close with broad spectrum of stakeholders including smes and large corporations subjects students learn business training and general trends in the raw materials value chain the challenges of mining activities in the world sustainable explorations of deposits and modern geological technologies for their identification new trends in the mining technologies and mineral processing problems post mining area water management reclamation revitalization modern and innovative machines and mining methods used in raw materials excavation economics and managerial finance in raw materials innovative processes for circular economy in the metals industry modern technologies in mineral processing metallurgical industry development nan application rules entrance exam average from studies

the field of aeronautics and astronautics offers education in the field of aviation and space technology the studies are aimed at acquiring knowledge and practical skills in the field of construction production and operation of aircraft and space objects they give the opportunity learn about technologically advanced construction systems using innovative technologies and technical solutions based the latest materials the latest computer techniques the latest electronics and extensive diagnostic systems ensuring the safety and reliability of flying objects offered specializations wybrane przedmioty znajdą programie kształcenia mathematics basics of engineering graphics computer science material science manufacturing engineering metrology electrical engineering and electronics aviation law and regulations digital and microprocessor systems basics of modelling physical systems aircraft materials studia odpowiednie osób odpowiedzialnych zdeterminowanych potrafiących poddać rygorom wojskowym rekrutacji punktowane przedmioty język polski język obcy matematyka fizyka
